Sentencas: Efficient utilization of oxygen-bearing low concentration coal-bed methane (LC-CBM) via solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) device to generate power is highly attractive and receives tremendous attention.
Titulo: Highly efficient conversion of oxygen-bearing low concentration coal-bed methane into power via solid oxide fuel cell integrated with an activated catalyst-modified anode microchannel

Sentencas: However, it is highly limited by the conversion efficiency and carbon formation during the operation.
Titulo: Highly efficient conversion of oxygen-bearing low concentration coal-bed methane into power via solid oxide fuel cell integrated with an activated catalyst-modified anode microchannel

Sentencas: Hence, in this study, a microchannel reactor coupled with highly active catalysts (Ni-Y2O3-Ce0.5Zr0.5O2) are integrated in the SOFC anode to boost the partial oxidation of methane (POM) efficiency and enhance the coking tolerance.
Titulo: Highly efficient conversion of oxygen-bearing low concentration coal-bed methane into power via solid oxide fuel cell integrated with an activated catalyst-modified anode microchannel

Sentencas: Benefiting from the integrated SOFC reactor, the methane conversion efficiency is increased from 23.59 % to 43.22 % at 750 degrees C when using 16 % CH4-4 %O2-80 %N2 as fuel.
Titulo: Highly efficient conversion of oxygen-bearing low concentration coal-bed methane into power via solid oxide fuel cell integrated with an activated catalyst-modified anode microchannel

Sentencas: Meanwhile, the related peak power density is increased from 904 mW cm-2 to 1208 mW cm-2.
Titulo: Highly efficient conversion of oxygen-bearing low concentration coal-bed methane into power via solid oxide fuel cell integrated with an activated catalyst-modified anode microchannel

Sentencas: The conversion efficiency and electrochemical performance both can be improved significantly.
Titulo: Highly efficient conversion of oxygen-bearing low concentration coal-bed methane into power via solid oxide fuel cell integrated with an activated catalyst-modified anode microchannel

Sentencas: Besides, the integrated SOFC reactor can work at 750 degrees C for more than 100 h, indicating the excellent anti-coking performance.
Titulo: Highly efficient conversion of oxygen-bearing low concentration coal-bed methane into power via solid oxide fuel cell integrated with an activated catalyst-modified anode microchannel

Sentencas: The proposed integrated SOFC reactor provides a great application potential for the efficient utilization of LC-CBM.
Titulo: Highly efficient conversion of oxygen-bearing low concentration coal-bed methane into power via solid oxide fuel cell integrated with an activated catalyst-modified anode microchannel
